game.name: Mens Fashion
game.description:
Why should girls have all the fun when it comes to exploring the modern fashion world? Boys also need some guidance when they go outside to attend any special event. In this brand new girls game, you are going to meet a boy who needs your support in exploring the exclusive fashion world of men. Would you like to support him with your cool fashion sense? Join Mens Fashion and be prepared to help him to prepare the awesome outfit designs for multiple events!

Not a single event, but he has nine different occasions including Beach, City, Date, School, Movie Time, Office, Park, Party and Road Trip to explore. You are playing the role of a stylist for a man in this one of the best HTML5 dressing game. Start this fashion fun by choosing any out of multiple hairstyles like half-razed, man buns or bangs! He will look awesome in different facial hair like beards and mustaches. Make sure to dress him with the trendy outfits shortly. 

Choose a yellow top and pair it with an orange t-shirt and pair it with a half denim or blue jeans in this dress-up game! Dress him with a blue and red check shirt or a green shirt without sleeves and combine his look with dark blue half pant with pockets on the side or a red half pant with some flower prints! Complete his look with a pair of matching red, blue or brown shoes and black and red or blue color sunglasses! We maintain a wider collection of fashion games to play online and, that too without download.
